about_the_game:
Galaxy Clicker is an idler desktop overlay that sits on the side of your screen. Gain Stardust by clicking, buy Stardust-generating celestial bodies, gain more Stardust, and repeat! Enjoy the satisfaction of incrementing numbers while getting other work done.



Click to Harvest Stardust:
Click on the originating planet to manually harvest Stardust. Gain a combo multiplier for clicking on critical harvest points.

Buy Celestial Bodies:
Stardust can be used to create celestial bodies that passively create more Stardust. Create stabilizing copies of Earth or black hole generators.

Buy Upgrades:
Upgrade your celestial bodies with your extra Stardust to increase Stardust-generating multipliers and increase the efficiency of your own manual Stardust harvesting.



Add Decorations:
Place animated cosmetic celestial bodies around your screen after you unlock them to decorate your workspace.

Multitask:
Galaxy Clicker runs as an overlay to your desktop, letting you position it anywhere on your screen. Harvest Stardust during breaks or to release some nervous energy, then you can get back to work!

name: Galaxy Clicker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 @ 3.2 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 128 MB available space

short_description: An idle clicker game that sits on the side of your screen. Watch the numbers go up while getting other important things done.
